title: Riot Girl Tristana
body: Can you get riot girl tristana any more?{{champion:18}}

replies.body: yeah send in a support ticket saying u liked league of legends on facebook and they will add it to your account, you can also do this for unchained alistar and dreadknight garen
Do they unlock the champions for you as well, like doing those things used to do?

> [{quoted}](name=Alu1n3th6,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ptMwrisU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-01T14:22:30.955+0000)
>
> Do they unlock the champions for you as well, like doing those things used to do?

yup they sure do
